title: Volume of solid of rev. about x-axis, secx

content.prompt: What is the volume of the solid generated by rotating about the x-axis the region enclosed by the curve y=sec x and the lines x=0, y=0, and  x = π 3 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3DE6@ ?

choices.label: π 3 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3C1D@

π ln ( 1 2 + 3 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@420C@

topic.text: 8.9: Volume with Disc Method - Revolving Around the x- or y-Axis

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Apply an appropriate mathematical definition, theorem, or test.
